analysis.description:
MetropolFundsRegistryWalletConnector.storeInvestment (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1372-1374) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- m_fundsAddress.invested.value(payment)(investor) (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1373-1374)

SimpleCrowdsaleBase.buyInternal (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1177-1232) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(startingInvariant == this.balance.add(getWeiCollected()).add(change))

Reentrancy in SimpleCrowdsaleBase.buyInternal (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1177-1232):
	External calls:
	- m_token.mint(investor,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1215-1218)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_finished (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1227)
change in SimpleCrowdsaleBase.buyInternal (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1198) is a local variable never initialiazed

MetropolCrowdsale.withdrawPayments (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1635-1642) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().burn(msg.sender,getToken().balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1637-1642)

Reentrancy in SimpleCrowdsaleBase.buyInternal (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1177-1232):
	External calls:
	- m_token.mint(investor,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1215-1218)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_tokensMinted (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1218-1219)

Reentrancy in StatefulReturnableCrowdsale.failCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1500-1505):
	External calls:
	- wcOnCrowdsaleFailure() (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1504)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_finished (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1505)

Reentrancy in StatefulReturnableCrowdsale.fundsChecker (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1420-1453):
	External calls:
	- atTheBeginning = getTotalInvestmentsStored() (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1423-1426)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_state (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1429-1430)

Reentrancy in StatefulReturnableCrowdsale.fundsChecker (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1420-1453):
	External calls:
	- atTheBeginning = getTotalInvestmentsStored() (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1423-1426)
	- getTotalInvestmentsStored() < atTheBeginning (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1444-1453)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_state (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1449-1450)

Reentrancy in StatefulReturnableCrowdsale.wcOnCrowdsaleFailure (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1544-1547):
	External calls:
	- super.wcOnCrowdsaleFailure() (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1546-1547)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_state (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1547)

Reentrancy in StatefulReturnableCrowdsale.wcOnCrowdsaleSuccess (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1538-1542):
	External calls:
	- super.wcOnCrowdsaleSuccess() (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1539-1541)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_state (/unique_contracts/0x162e8ff9d5bc3112fb3b2dec0580a4011f3cc622.sol#1541-1542)
